constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: LLA Maximum height level: All buildings, structures, and works exceeding 300 metres in height (984.2 feet)
100Y Name: Southgate ModelDescription: 100YRCC2581Scenario: 1 in 100 year plus climate change allowance
CILRES CIL ZONE: Lower Rate Eastern Zone - RATE: £40 per square metre
DMDAAP Designation: Area Action Plan- Area: North East Enfield- Policy: Core policy 40
DMDRET Designation: Retail Parks- Location: De Mandeville Gate Retail Park- Policy: DMD 25- Core Strategy: Core policy 18

description: Change of use from retail (Use Class E(a) to flexible retail / gym (Use Class E(a)/E(d)).
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of the decision notice. Reason: To comply with the provisions of S.51 of the Planning & Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the approved plans, as set out in the attached schedule which forms part of this notice. SUDS PROFORMA  18070 THPL 00 XX DR A 105 (Existing Elevations & Section)18070 THPL 00 XX DR A 103 (Existing First Floor Plan)18070 THPL 00 XX DR A 102 (Existing Ground Floor Plan)18070 THPL 00 XX DR A 104 (Existing Roof Plan)18070 THPL 00 XX DR A 124 (Proposed Elevations & Section)18070 THPL 00 XX DR A 122 (Proposed First Floor Plan)	18070 THPL 00 XX DR A 121 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan)18070 THPL 00 XX DR A 123 (Proposed Roof Plan)18070 THPL 00 XX DR A 100 (Site Location Plan)18070 THPL 00 XX DR A 120 (Proposed Block Plan)18070 THPL 00 XX DR A 101 (Existing Block Plan)Noise Impact Assessment dated 10th February 2025Marketing AdvertHighway Safety Impact FormPlanning StatementPark Place Retail Assessment Marketing LetterReason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification, the premises shall be used for Class E (a) and Class E (d) and no other purpose outside of Class E (a) and Class E (d) unless written permission is otherwise granted.Reason: To prevent the introduction uses that would give rise to conditions prejudicial to the character of the area.

No occupation of the development shall take place until an acoustic report, written in line with the methodology in BS4142:2014+A1 2019, has been submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority. The report must set out the sound level generated from the combined mechanical plant and state the noise control measures to be employed to ensure the noise from the combined mechanical plant does not exceed a level of 5dB below the typical measured background noise level measured as L(A)90 15 minutes during operational hours, at the façade of the nearest or most noise affected residential property.Reason: To protect the local amenity from noise and disturbance.

No occupation of the development shall take place until an acoustic report has been submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority. The report must be written in line with ProPG: Gym Acoustics Guidance and set out the impact of the gym use on the neighbouring retail unit and propose noise control measures where the guide criteria in Table 2 and Table 3 of the aforementioned document for retail areas is predicted to be exceeded. All recommended noise control measures must be fully implemented prior to occupation of the building.Reason: To protect the local amenity from noise and disturbance.
site_name: Unit 1De Mandeville Retail Park337A Southbury RoadEnfieldEN1 1TW
